This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Cmd+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}
Campus=c("Avenida de Berna", "Campo Santana", "Campus de Campolide", "Caparica", "Carcavelos")
Students=c(5234,1234,2321,8646,3278) 
table=table(Campus=Campus) 
table[1:5]=Students 
table

```

Add a new chunk by clicking the *Insert Chunk* button on the toolbar or by pressing *Cmd+Option+I*.

```{r}
pie(table, main="Pie chart of Campi", sub="NOVA Fall 2017 Undergraduate Enrollments")

```

```{r}
barplot(table, main="Barplot of Campi", col="yellow", sub="NOVA Fall 2017 Undergraduate Enrollments",las=0, cex.sub=0.7,cex.lab=0.3)

```
